Dated: -     /02/2014   
 
AVSEC ORDER NO.: 01 /2014 
 
Reference: AVSEC Order no. – 06/2009 dated 04/11/2009 
 
Subject: Exemption from pre-embarkation security checks at Civil Airports. 
 
With reference to Sl. no.–15 of AVSEC Order mentioned above, it is directed that 
no exemption should be given to Thai Ambassador. 
2. 
Further, the following Airport facilities / courtesies are withdrawn in respect of 
Embassy of Thailand in New Delhi, with immediate effect:   
Sl. no.
Facilities 
Actions 
1.  
VIP Lounge (Reserve 
Lounge) 
No Reserve Lounge facility should be given to Thai 
Ambassador or Thai dignitaries below the rank of 
Minister. 
2.  
Photography / iris scan 
at Immigration Counter 
Thai Diplomats and dignitaries coming through 
the normal channel should not be given any 
exemption. 
  
3. 
The above order is also applicable in respect of Consulates of Thailand in 
Chennai, Kolkata and Mumbai and Thai Trade Centre in Mumbai. 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation). 
 
 
 
 (R.N. Dhoke, IPS)  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached / overleaf. 
 
Copy to: 
 
MCA (Shri S.V. Ramana, Under Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi w.r.t. MCA letter 
no.- AV.13024/18/2005-SS dated 05/02/2014.
